thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com | 3 of 52
thread.title: Cynthia

author: Cynthia
title: Cynthia
text: After browsing Saatchi Art for a few months, and being hesitant to spend a lot on art I could not see in person, I finally saw a piece I simply had to have. I took the plunge and ordered the painting online. I was so pleasantly surprised!! The transaction was quickly acknowledged by Saatchi and the art arrived at my door in the US (from Canada) within a week. The piece was amazingly well packaged! Upon opening it, I found it to be exactly as pictured on the website. I would not hesitate to purchase again from Saatchi, and I surely will in the near future.
